item.title: Docs: Standard text messages (VATSIM, pseudo CPDLC)
item.description:
Check Standard Pressure is set (1013 hPa)
Squawk %d%d%d%d%.
Squawk %d%d%d%d
Contact #LAS #LMS %d%d%d.%d%d%d
Report your heading to #LAS #LMS %d%d%d.%d%d%d
Report your speed to #LAS #LMS %d%d%d.%d%d%d
Report your heading and speed to #LAS #LMS %d%d%d.%d%d%d
No Further ATC available. Monitor Unicom 122.800
You are currently outside my airspace. Monitor Unicom 122.800
is offline - monitor unicom 122.800
Fly heading %d%d%d degrees
Fly heading %d%d degrees
Turn right heading %d%d%d degrees
Turn right heading %d%d degrees
Turn left heading %d%d degrees
Turn left heading %d%d%d degrees
Route Direct #FIX
Resume own navigation direct #FIX
Climb to altitude #ALTAft
Climb now to altitude #ALTAft
Climb FL#FLA
Climb now FL#FLA
Descend to altitude #ALTAft QNH #QNHA
Descend to altitude #ALTAft
Descend FL#FLA
Decend now FL#FLA
When ready, descend FL#FLA
Speed #SPDA knots
Mach #MAHA
